item.title: FPS Multiplayer game in Unreal Engine 4
item.description: I made a FPS multiplayer game with Unreal Engine 4 that aims to emulate the experience of the renowned CS:GO.

item.title: Welcome to my home lab!
item.description: Here, servers do their thing, code gets a bit wild, and it's a mix of organized chaos. Come tag along as I share the ups, downs, and the funny moments of my IT adventures. Interested in some geeky fun? Cool, let's dive in!
